mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE(NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_READCOUNT, NOTICE_IMAGE) values (#{num}, #{id}, #{type}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{date}, #{readcount}, #{image})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from NOTICE
where NOTICE_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or NOTICE_CONTENT like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select NOTICE_NUM as "num", ADMIN_ID as "id", NOTICE_TYPE as "type", NOTICE_SUBJECT as "subject", NOTICE_CONTENT as "content", NOTICE_DATE as "date", NOTICE_READCOUNT as "readcount", NOTICE_IMAGE as "image" from NOTICE where NOTICE_NUM = #{num}
